item.title: Show and Tell: A Neural Image Caption Generator
item.description: In this project, we Develope data products to help Airbnb hosts to determine listing prices using Sparse Regression and RandomForest Researched how amenities and geolocation in uence listing prices Designed a User Interface for customers to gain insight into Airbnb rental markets in Boston The Video Presentation and Rshiny App Demo are also provided.
